children.name: Unit 1 All
children.description: All Questions in Unit 1 Introduction to Business Management

children.name: 1.1 - What is a Business?
children.description: The Nature of Business, Sectors of the Economy, Entrepreneurship, Challenges & Opportunities for Starting Up a Business

children.name: 1.2 - Types of Business Entities
children.description: Sole Traders, Partnerships, Privately & Publicly Held Companies, Private & Public Sector Companies, Cooperatives, NGOs

children.name: 1.3 - Business Objectives
children.description: Vision & Mission Statement , Business Objectives, Strategic & Tactical Objectives, Corporate Social Responsibility

children.name: 1.4 - Stakeholders
children.description: Internal & External Stakeholders, Conflicts Between Stakeholders

children.name: 1.5 - Growth and Evolution
children.description: Economies & Diseconomies of Scale, Mergers & Acquisitions, Takeovers, Joint Ventures, Strategic Alliances, Franchising

children.name: 1.6 - Multinational Companies (MNCs)
children.description: Multinational Companies (MNCs)

children.name: Unit 2 All
children.description: All Questions in Unit 2 Human Resource Management

children.name: 2.1 - Introduction to Human Resource Management
children.description: Role of Human Resource Management, Internal & External Factors Impacting HRM, Resistance to Change, HRM Strategies

children.name: 2.2 - Organizational Structure
children.description: Types of Organizational Structures, Types of Organization Charts

children.name: 2.3 - Leadership and Management
children.description: Leadership & Management, Leadership Styles

children.name: 2.4 - Motivation and Demotivation
children.description: Motivational Theories, Maslow, Taylor & Herzberg, Financial & Non-Financial Rewards, Types of Training

children.name: 2.6 - Communication
children.description: Formal & Informal Methods of Communication, Barriers to Communication

children.name: Unit 3 All
children.description: All Questions in Unit 3 Finance and Accounts

children.name: 3.1 - Introduction to Finance
children.description: Role of Finance, Capital Expenditure, Revenue Expenditure

children.name: 3.2 - Sources of Finance
children.description: Internal & External Sources of Finance, Short & Long Term Sources of Finance

children.name: 3.3 - Costs and Revenues
children.description: Types of Costs, Total Revenue & Revenue Streams

children.name: 3.4 - Final Accounts
children.description: Final Accounts, Types of Intangible Assets

children.name: 3.5 - Profitability and Liquidity Ratio Analysis
children.description: Profitability ratios, Liquidity Ratios

children.name: 3.7 - Cash Flow
children.description: Cash Flow, Investment, Profit, Working Capital, Liquidity Position

children.name: 3.8 - Investment Appraisal
children.description: Investment Appraisal, Payback Period, Average Rate of Return

children.name: Unit 4 All
children.description: All Questions in Unit 4 Marketing

children.name: 4.1 - Introduction to Marketing
children.description: Market-Orientation, Product Orientation, Market Share, Market Growth, Market Leadership

children.name: 4.2 - Marketing Planning
children.description: Segmentation, Targeting, Positioning, Niche & Mass Market, Unique Selling Point

children.name: 4.4 - Market Research
children.description: Primary and Secondary Market Research, Qualitative and Quantitative Research, Sampling

children.name: 4.5 - The Seven P's of The Marketing Mix
children.description: Product, Price, Promotion, Place, People, Processes, Physical Evidences, Marketing Mix, Branding

children.name: Unit 5 All
children.description: All Questions in Unit 5 Operations Management

children.name: 5.1 - Introduction to Operations Management
children.description: Role of Operations Management

children.name: 5.2 - Operations Methods
children.description: Job Production, Batch Production, Mass/Flow production, Mass Customization

children.name: 5.4 - Location
children.description: Outsourcing/Subcontracting, Offshoring, Insourcing, Reshoring

children.name: 5.5 - Break-Even Analysis
children.description: Break-Even Analysis/Chart, Total Contribution Versus Contribution Per Unit

children.description: All Questions in Toolkit Business Management Toolkit

children.name: BMT 1 - SWOT Analysis
children.description: SWOT Analysis

children.description: Ansoff Matrix

children.description: STEEPLE Analysis

children.description: Boston Consultancy Group Matrix

children.description: Business Plan

children.description: Decision Trees

children.description: Descriptive Statistics
